# Hougang

```{r message=FALSE,echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(tmap)
library(tmaptools)
library(extrafont)
```

```{r message=FALSE,echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
hougangspaces1905<-read_csv(here::here('irpdata/Hougang19052020.csv'))
hougangspaces2205<-read_csv(here::here('irpdata/Hougang22052020.csv'))

planning_areas<-readRDS(here::here("irpdata/planning_areas.rds"))
Hougang<-planning_areas %>% 
  filter(PLN_AREA_N=="HOUGANG") %>% 
  filter(PLN_AREA_C=="HG") %>% 
  select(-REGION_N,-REGION_C)
```

```{r message=FALSE,echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
hougangspaces1905<-hougangspaces1905 %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c('lon', 'lat'))
hougangspaces2205<-hougangspaces2205 %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c('lon', 'lat'))

st_crs(hougangspaces1905)<-"+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +no_defs"
st_crs(hougangspaces2205)<-"+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +no_defs"
```

```{r message=FALSE,echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
tmap_mode("view")

tm_shape(Hougang)+
  tm_fill(col = "#E5ECC3",alpha = 0.2)+
  tm_borders(lty = "longdash")+
tm_shape(hougangspaces1905)+
  tm_symbols(size = 0.02, col= "Category", alpha=0.7)+
tm_shape(hougangspaces2205)+
  tm_symbols(size = 0.02, col= "Category", alpha=0.7,legend.col.show = FALSE)
```
